name: A and Z Dip
author: Tina Brewster
summary: A cold artichoke and zucchini dip that can be served with crackers, corn chips, or raw vegetables.  Add more hot sauce or pico de gallo seasoning to spice it up!
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
½ teaspoon pico de gallo seasoning
directions: Place the zucchini in a colander, and sprinkle with salt
Place the colander over a bowl, and refrigerate for one hour to release the liquid from the zucchini
In a medium bowl, mix together the cream cheese and sour cream
Stir in the artichoke hearts, drained zucchini, and black olives
Season with hot sauce, salt, pepper, and pico de gallo seasoning
Serve with crackers, raw vegetables, or corn chips
